eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\frac{\Psi}{N} &=& -\frac{2}{\beta L} \sum_{n=0}^{n_{\Lambda}} \ln \left[ \left(1+{\rm e}^{-\beta (E_n-\mu)}\right)
\left( 1+{\rm e}^{\beta (E_n+\mu)}\right)\right] \ \nonumber \\
&+&
\frac{1}{2 Ng^2 L} \int_0^L {\rm d}x S^2(x) \ .
\label{t6}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Delta(k) &=& q -k + {\rm sgn}(k-q)\sqrt{(k-q)^2+|S_1|^2} + \frac{|S_1|^2}{2(k+q)} 
\nonumber \\
& & \qquad \qquad \qquad  {\rm for} \ \ k \in \left[\frac{q}{2},
\frac{3q}{2}\right] \ ,
\nonumber \\
\Delta(k) & = &  \frac{|S_1|^2}{2} \left( \frac{1}{k-q} + \frac{1}{k+q}\right)
\nonumber \\
& & \qquad \qquad \qquad  {\rm for} \ 0<  k<q/2 \ , k > 3 q/2 \ .
\label{t14}
\
